Package org.neo4j.values.storable

Class UTF8StringValueBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.values.storable.UTF8StringValueBuilder
  • class UTF8StringValueBuilder
extends Object
    Helper class for dynamically building UTF8StringValue.

    Either add individual bytes via add(byte) or add a unicode code point via addCodePoint(int). The builder maintains an internal byte[] and grows it as necessary.

      • addCodePoint

        void addCodePoint​(int codePoint)
        Add a single code point to the builder.

        In UTF8 a code point use one to four bytes depending on the code point at hand. So we will have one of the following cases (x marks the bits of the codepoint):

        • One byte (asciii): 0xxx xxxx
        • Two bytes: 110xxxxx 10xxxxxx
        • Three bytes: 1110xxxx 10xxxxxx 10xxxxxx
        • Four bytes: 11110xxx 10xxxxxx 10xxxxxx 10xxxxxx
        Parameters:
        codePoint - the code point to add
